gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `PropertyPlantEquipment` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `PropertyPlantEquipment` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice` gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_PropertyPlantEquipmentActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende domeinleden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_PropertyPlantEquipmentMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_PropertyPlantEquipment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_PropertyPlantEquipment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfPropertyPlantEquipmentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` en `PropertyPlantEquipmentMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `PropertyPlantEquipment` zonder `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` en `PropertyPlantEquipmentMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PropertyPlantEquipment` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` en `RealEstateAndMovablePropertyUsedForExploitationMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `RealEstateAndMovablePropertyUsedForExploitation` zonder `ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis` en `RealEstateAndMovablePropertyUsedForExploitationMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPropertyPlantEquipmentMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfPropertyPlantEquipmentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
